author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Declare the copy constructor and assignment operators to the Pool class
private, and add a comment explaining why.  Followup to r24541.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Use the updated Pool class for subpools as well.  Followup to r24541.
Because Pool objects have the lifetime of their enclosing block, they will
automagically get destroyed when that block ends, so both the parent pool, and
any other pools declared in that function, will get destroyed.
(deltify, rmtxns, rmlocks): Use Pool object for subpools.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Accept NULL as changelist and matching_changelist arguments of

author: joeswatosh
msg: Accept NULL as changelist name argument of svn_client_commit4().

author: hwright
msg: (getContext): Fix some function calls to no-space-before-paren style.
